VhDir Ehr Patient Access Value Set

Codes for documenting patient facing access to an electronic health record system.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/ehrcharacteristics
    CodeDisplay
    portalpatient portalA patient portal is a secure online website that gives patients convenient, 24-hour access to personal health information from anywhere with an Internet connection
    messagingsecure messagingEHR functionality that enables a user to send messages to, and receive messages from, a patient in a secure manner
    VDTview/download/transmit (VDT)EHR functionality that enables patients (and their authorized representatives) to use internet-based technology to view, download, and transmit their health information to a 3rd party.
